forum.content:
(本文歌詞中英對照)


Up on a hill is where we begin最多在山上，是我们开始
This little story a long time ago这个小故事是很久以前
Stop to pretend, stop pretending停止假装，假装停止
It seems this game is simply never-ending看来这游戏简直是永无止境
In the sun, sun having fun在阳光下，有乐趣的太阳
It's in my blood这是在我的血液
I just can't help it我不能帮助它
Don't want you to say, "No"不想让你说“不”
Let me go, oh, let me g-g-g-g-g-g-go让我走，哦，让我的G-G - G-G - G-G -去

Leavin' just in time再走正是时候
Stay there for a while在那里逗留了一会儿
Rolling in the ocean翻滚的海洋
Trying to catch her eye试图抓住她的眼睛
Work hard and say it's easy努力工作，并说这是很容易
Do it just to please me这样做只是为了取悦我
Tomorrow it is different明天是不同的
So I'll pretend, I'll pretend I'm leaving所以我会假装，我会假装我要走了

Our fears are different here我们的恐惧是不同的位置
We train in A-V-A我们培养的A- Ⅴ-A
I wish you hadn't stayed我希望你没有留
My vision's clearer now, but I'm unafraid我的目标更清晰了，但我不怕
Flying overseas, no time to feel the breeze飞海外，没有时间去感受微风
Too many varieties品种太多
Well, in the sun, sun having fun好了，在阳光下，有乐趣的太阳
It's in my blood这是在我的血液
I just can't help it我不能帮助它
Don't want you here right now不想你现在在这里
Let me go让我走
Oh, let me g-g-g-g-g-g-go哦，让我的G-G - G-G - G-G -去

Leaving just in time离开正是时候
Stay there for a while在那里逗留了一会儿
Rolling in the ocean翻滚的海洋
Trying to catch her eye试图抓住她的眼睛
Work hard and say it's easy努力工作，并说这是很容易
Do it just to please me这样做只是为了取悦我
Tomorrow it is different明天是不同的
So this is why I'm leaving所以这就是为什么我要离开
forum.title: The Strokes - The Modern Age
